name: open-mem
description: Persistent memory plugin for OpenCode â€” captures, compresses, and recalls context across coding sessions

scripts.build: bun run build:bundle && bun run build:mcp && bun run build:daemon && bun run build:dashboard && bun run build:types
scripts.build:dashboard: cd dashboard && bun install && bun run build && cp -r dist ../dist/dashboard
scripts.build:bundle: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target bun --format esm --minify --external bun:sqlite --external ai --external @ai-sdk/anthropic --external @ai-sdk/amazon-bedrock --external @ai-sdk/openai --external @ai-sdk/google --external sqlite-vec
scripts.build:mcp: bun build src/mcp.ts --outdir dist --target bun --format esm --minify --external bun:sqlite --external ai --external @ai-sdk/anthropic --external @ai-sdk/amazon-bedrock --external @ai-sdk/openai --external @ai-sdk/google --external sqlite-vec
scripts.build:daemon: bun build src/daemon.ts --outdir dist --target bun --format esm --minify --external bun:sqlite --external ai --external @ai-sdk/anthropic --external @ai-sdk/amazon-bedrock --external @ai-sdk/openai --external @ai-sdk/google --external sqlite-vec
scripts.prepare: test -d src && bun run build || true
